warningRecipeAlreadyOpen: We already started a WorKOrder!If I open another one, we won't be able to continue the current one and all the timers will be canceled! Confirm your intention by asking me again to open the workorder.
confirmOpening: Ok, I'm opening the {} workorder, one moment
workOrderNotFound: I'm sorry but I can't find this recipe
sorryNoWorkOrderOpen: Sorry, but you never asked me to open a workorder!
workOrderEnd: We came to the end of the workorder, there's no further steps
timerAsk: This step has a timer. You can ask me to start it whenever you are ready
neededTools: To prepare the {} workorder you will need the following tools: {}
hadTimerAsk: This step was having a timer of {} seconds. You can ask my to start it if you are ready
nothingToSayNotStarted: I have nothing to repeat, we did not even start
noTimerNotStarted: Timer? We don't even have a workorder yet!
notTimerForThisStep: There's no recipe for this step
timerAlreadyRunning: A timer is already started for this step
timerConfirm: Ok! Timer for this step started!
error: Sorry, but there was an error
